alert.note: Alert for North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 4:57AM MST until December 26 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches possible. * WHERE...Denver. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org. Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination.

area.areaDesc: North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
